Location is central to food, shopping, and about a 15minute drive to the beach. Staff was pleasant including a very positive interaction with the manager. Noisy at night. Breakfast options are ok. We had some concerns with safety including one of our party going to her room only to find it open and an incident with a homeless individual whom appeared to be inebriated in the lobby at breakfast. Rooms are motel style. Overall it met our needs but will likely look for nicer accommodations when we return next year.

We greatly appreciate your recognition of the property’s assets and amenities and our management team. I have spoken with my maintenance team about installing our new soundproof walls to ensure this does not happen again. At Comfort Inn & Suites we pride ourselves on providing authentic hospitality and superior service and we thank you for choosing Comfort Inn & Suites Huntington Beach for your trip to Surf City USA. We sincerely hope that you are able to visit us again soon.  Comfort Inn & Suites Huntington Beach  714.841.1812

Summary: For the price, this was a nice hotel. I had a little issue with my initial room as the air conditioning unit seemed to be having some type of issue and whined very loudly. After reporting this to the front desk in the morning I was moved that afternoon. My second room was much better as the ac worked great and the move to the back of the hotel was a welcomed relief as the traffic on Beach Boulevard is awfully loud at all hours. Both rooms were surprisingly clean and well maintained. Staff was very courteous and prompt attention was given to any issues. The breakfast was a bit lackluster but edible for a quick morning bite, although you cannot leave the eating area with any food - even to go back to your room. I would recommend this hotel and would stay here again.

You must eat in their kitchen area and there was a staff member standing there making sure you didn't leave with your food.  There were some shady people hanging around the area but no one bothered us. The hotel is located on a busy street so you do hear some traffic noise, but not enough to disturb your sleep.

Summary Heading: They make promises they don’t keep
Summary: After trying to cancel a stay due to a flat tire 70 miles in on a 400 mile drive, hotel management told me I would be charged because I didn’t call 24 hours in advance but they could offer me a one night stay within 3 months. When I tried to reserve a room 2 months later they refused to honor because they didn’t make notes and didn’t send me the offer in writing. Worst customer service!

We have a 24 hour cancellation policy that does not allow us to cancel anything after date assigned. I apologize for any inconvenience this have may caused you. Summary: Location perfect.  Rooms small, but adequate -- look like all new furnishings.  Front desk staff friendly and helpful.  Breakfast buffet has a variety of offerings.  We got a great rate on booking.com.  Looked like it was a former motel as entry to rooms were outside.  That was not a big deal, but it was a little cool the days we were there.  Also there were some dark corners we had to pass by to get to our room, which was a little disconcerting.  Overall we would stay there again for the rate, friendly staff and breakfast buffet.

The stench of smoke by the ice machine was overwhelming. I found someone else's pill bottle under my bed.The doors are on the outside of the building. The manager watched my 67 yo mother and myself struggle to get the outdated luggage cart out of the building and told us it would work better if we turned it around. We checked out early went to the crowns plaza and had an amazing stay for the same price... breakfast seemed decent but the eating area was packed. People at jack in the box next door were super friendly. Beds were comfortable, not that you could sleep from the street noise.

Summary: I stayed 1 night on my way to San Diego. My first impression was not favorable. Office/lobby is very small and same for breakfast area but seems to work. It would not call the rooms suites, too small for 2 beds. Everything in the rooms was modern and well maintained though. Pool area is not an area that seems inviting. The breakfast was very good and room though small  was comfortable. Bottom line is that it worked out ok for 1 night at a fair price.

We stayed because my wife had had surgery that week and the long drive home in traffic would have been uncomfortable. After check in I struck up a conversation with some other customers and found out that the city Surf open started that day and that everything in town had sold out or was close driving prices up.  So it was expensive for what we needed however it was clean comfortable reasonably quiet close to beach and shopping and the complimentary breakfast was adequate.

Summary: Ok, so normally you talk about the room and stuff.  But the bed was amazing!  It was big and firm, but not hard.  The pillows were plentiful too.  Haha...the room was pretty basic, but that's all we needed.  The pool was refreshing after a long hot day of theme park and LA traffic.  The breakfast had a good variety and the coffee was good.  Price was reasonable.  I'd recommend this place to friends.

Right across the road from a few different takeaways and restaurants. Would definitely return and hopefully get to spend some time down at the beach.

If I had known this is what it was like, we'd have stayed somewhere else. The rooms are clean but breakfast is okay. They have waffles and pancakes, which is unusual to have both but that was about it for us. There was almost no taste to the eggs, there was no peanut butter for bread, no wheat bread and the juices were watered down. I've never stayed at a place where you have to show your room card and give your room number when you go into the breakfast area. This was odd to be and added to my uneasy feelings. Summary Heading: Good night's rest and okay breakfast
Summary: The room was small, but it was clean and had a good firm bed and plenty of amenities.  The breakfast  was okay...said hot, and there were some hot things, but not a buffet, pretty minimal for a hot breakfast.  Did have eggs and some meat ( was okay).  Staff was pleasant and helpful. Shopping galore and beach close by...5 stars on proximity to freeway and plenty of restaurants, shopping, and the beach was about 10 - 15 mins straight down Beach Blvd.

Summary: Myself and my partner originally booked to stay 1 night here and after viewing the room extended our stay to 2 nights. The rooms are spacious, clean and modern. The hotel staff were extremely friendly and accommodating. Included in our stay was a free complimentary breakfast - couldn't fault it, had a good variety! Would definitely recommend and stay again. Free and secure parking was an added bonus.

Thank you again for sharing your experience, and we hope your next visit will be even more pleasant than the previous one.  Thank you, Comfort Suits Huntington Beach (714) 841-1812

Summary Heading: Great stay, stayed a second night.
Summary: After a long day in LA/Hollywood we had no hotel at around 6pm and couldn't find one for a decent price. Decided to head to HB and found this hotel. Great stay. Booked twice by accident online due to refreshing phone. The reception cancelled the booking for free. Room was spacious, very clean, modern and very sound proof. Bed was amazing and the blackout curtains were 10/10. Bathroom was big and a good shower. Safe in the room. Everything you need.   Free breakfast was great and the staff were friendly and more than happy to help. Would stay here again.   After the first night we added a second night. Plus Huntington Beach is such a good place.

We just received a call from Alondra at this location informing us that we were being charged for an iron stain on the bed sheets in our room. We were out of the room the entirety of our day yesterday and only returned back at the hotel at 10:30 pm, exhausted and grumpy we noticed that the sheets had been changed and that there was a burn stain on them, but consciously chose not to make a scene and to be good hotel guests. We also never used our iron in the time that these sheets would have been on the bed in the room. Alondra was rude on the phone, as well as vague in the message she left us. $125 for damage we did not do to the hotel room is absolutely inappropriate and awful service. We have disputed the

Summary: Found this hotel on a internet search. It was the best rate in the area.  The hotel was clean and the rooms comfortable. fast internet service. Friendly staff, The breakfast starts a bit late at 7:00 am.  The area is primarily a business area. The hotel is about a 15 min drive from Huntington Beach.

Summary: This hotel is lovely. The suites are clean with a good sized bathrooms. The kids loved the pool area. Great location (10 min drive from the beach and surrounded by shops) Staff were helpful and friendly.

Summary: Very comfortable and well located establishment. Considering the location next to a very busy main road it is very quiet. Plenty of restaurants and shops within easy walking distance and only a short drive from the beach. The only problem we had was with the in-room safe which was quickly sorted. All the staff were friendly and helpful and the breakfast was pretty food.

The pool area was nice.  It was too cold for swimming, but we used the hot tub.  No complaints...
Manager Response: Dear valued guest,  We appreciate the time you took to share your thoughts and for choosing to stay at our property. Sorry for the trouble you experienced finding our property. It is wonderful to hear that you enjoyed the hotel surroundings and that you found our front desk staff good and friendly. Come again soon!

Summary: I travel out west a lot and usually always stay at another big name hotel. This Comfort Suites was two blocks away from my granddaughter that I was visiting, so thought I would give it a try. The most important thing for me is how clean the room is, I don't really use other facilities such as gym, pool, etc. I must say that this was one of the cleanest, if not the cleanest of any hotel I've stayed in over the past 25 years of travel out west. The price was great, saved $400 over other hotel I had booked first, but then cancelled for this Comfort Suites. It's close to freeway 405, stores, food, etc.
Manager Response: Dear valued guest, Thank you so much for your positive comments on our property! It is greatly appreciated and wonderful to know that you enjoy your time with us. We are looking forward to seeing you back with us again soon.

Summary: Remember you have Choices! We initially chose the Comfort Suites after recently staying in another of the chain's hotels in Gallup, NM. Unfortunately by the time we booked our room the prices had gone up - apparently there's a conference in town! I asked for a quiet room when I made the reservation and again at check it. We were given Room 218 that's located close to the street. We found it stuffy so we opened the window. Unfortunately the roar of motorcycles and the din of traffic made our stay here generally not very satisfactory. On a positive note: The exercise room was a plus for my wife.  So consider your options...this hotel property is located on one of the busiest streets in Orange County. Finally I urge management to get rid of the unhealthy styrofoam cups and plates.
Manager Response: Dear valued guest,  Thank you for taking the time to complete our online review regarding your recent stay at our hotel. We are sorry the room location was not the best for you, we do have a quiet area away from the street. We encourage you to ask for the back quiet area on your future stays. We are glad to hear you have enjoyed out fitness room, maybe on your next stay you can try going for a swim in our pool & spa. We do want to inform you that since your last stay we have gotten rid of Styrofoam cops and plates and we now use paper plates and paper cups. Thank you again for sharing your experience,  We look forward to another opportunity to host you at our property, and once again, thank you for your comments!  Thank you, Comfort Suits Huntington Beach (714) 841-1812

Summary: Booked this hotel months ago for a surgery I was having. On the day of check in I wasn't able to move from the car as I just had my procedure. My husband went to check in for us and the man at the desk wouldn't let him because his name wasn't on the room! The man had to walk out to our car and have my sign a form....I mean really?! We finally made it to our room which was very nice and clean. The next morning around 10a my husband was down stairs checking out for us. I was sitting up on the bed waiting for him to come back and grab our things(as I couldn't). The maid is knocking at the door then just lets herself in when I told her not ready! She proceeds to stand there telling me "she has to clean the room" I told her sorry come back in a few that he'll be right back...she then
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, Thank you for taking the time to complete our online review regarding your recent stay at our hotel. I apologize that you left our hotel unhappy. Accept my apologies on behalf of all of our staff.  Your responses will serve as encouragement to all of our staff as we continuously improve the quality of our services to provide an exceptional experience for our guests. We look forward to another opportunity to host you at our property, and leave satisfied. Once again, thank you for your comments!  Thank you, Comfort Suits Huntington Beach   (714) 841-1812

Summary: Stayed here one night before running Surf City Marathon. So enjoyed my spa dip before the race. My room was spacious and comfortable. Loved all the outlets. My bed was great. I loved being able to take great coffee from the lobby with me to the race. A great find was Lazy Dog Cafe across the street. It's ranked #1 in Westminster for good reason. The lettuce wraps and Brussels sprouts were amazing. The hotel recommended it. I've already booked my stay for next year. This is the best Choice hotel I've stayed in.
Manager Response: Dear Valued guest, Thank you for your sweet review. It is such a joy to read your comments. We look forward to welcoming you back next year and providing you with another exceptional experience. If you need anything give us a call directly at 714-841-1812.

Summary: There is a 24 HR CXL POLICY.  I tried unsuccessfully to cancel our reservation 20 hours before arrival because I had been in emergency medical treatment at cxl time and had to cxl our entire trip to California. Three calls later and with a promise to hear from the manager Mike, I never heard anything except that we would be considered a chargeable NO-SHOW. Rude and inconsiderate.  I should have paid better attention to the other reviews about this bunch.  Bad form..........
Manager Response: Dear valued guest, We thank you for your feedback. I am sorry to hear that you unhappy. We do have a 24hour cancellation policy in place that we must follow. We do make sure that all of guest our in agreement with this policy prior to booking. We would love for you to give us a second chance and choose to stay with us on your next trip to California. I am certain you will have an excellent stay. I am also happy to inform you of our new free shuttles and that drives down to Huntington Beach Pier and Downtown area. If you need anything give us a call directly at 714-841-1812. We would love to hear from you.

Summary: Hotel is conveniently located near the freeway and several restaurants & a shopping center.  Check-in was OK, front staff could have been a bit friendlier.  Hallways run along the outside of the hotel, like a Motel 6.  Room was clean and everything was in working order.  Bed was comfortable and I didn't hear any noise from neighbors or the surrounding neighborhood.  Fitness center access is a bit odd, as it requires a separate key you must check out from the front desk.  Terrible smell inside the fitness center, too, and the machines were very old.  Breakfast was about what you'd expect from a place that offers free breakfast.  Check-out was simple.  I noticed I was overcharged for something on the final bill and it was removed without hassle.
Manager Response: Dear valued guest, Thank you for taking the time to give us your feedback. I am happy to hear that you enjoyed the location and the many surrounding shops/restaurants around the hotel. I am sorry the front desk staff did not meet you expectations. We have gone through many change and now have free shuttle that drives down to the Huntington Beach Pier and Downtown area. We would love to have you back to experience it yourself. We want to make sure that you not only have an OK stay but an exceptional one. If you need anything please give us a call directly at 714-841-1812.

Summary: Hotel MRG call me nasty woman, liar and that I was not deaf in my right ear. First claim he was manager then owner. All about taking coffee and Danish back to room. Original comment too big to post...
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest, Thank you for your feedback. I apologize that you left our hotel unhappy. Accept my apologies on behalf of all of our staff. We would love a second opportunity to make it up to you on a future stay. I am certain that you will leave our hotel with 100% satisfaction. If you need anything call our us directly at 714-841-1812. Thank you.

Summary Heading: Nice stay in a convenient location
Summary: The Hunting Beach Comfort Suites is in a very convenient location in Huntington Beach. It is close to shopping, restaurants, and I-405. The rooms appear to have been renovated in the past couple of years and the two rooms we stayed in were in good shape. The rooms each had a comfortable king-size bed, a sofa, refrigerator, closet, closet safe, and cable TV, coffee pot, iron, and hair dryer. The only real drawback to the room was the height of the bathroom counter. It was about 6 inches lower than normal and I am pretty short. It could be very awkward for someone close to 6 feet tall or taller. The desk staff was friendly and helpful. On our last day, the cleaning crew still had not been into our room by 3 PM and we mentioned it to the front desk. Our room was clean when we
Manager Response: Dear valued guest, Thank you for taking the time to share with us your experience. We have noted your comments about the bathtub, outside walkway, and elevator. We will work hard to try to fix the appearance in those areas. other than that, I am happy to hear that you had an overall good stay and are planning on returning. We look forward to having you back with us soon.

Summary: Terrible customer service. The front desk was rude and impatient every time I spoke with them. My husband arrived after midnight and came straight to the room which meant that his car was towed in the morning because he didn't stop at the front desk. Note the front desk has cameras everywhere so they saw that he was staying at the hotel.  Breakfast was good but the area was too small and always crowded. The cleaning staff and breakfast lady were super nice to my kids and me. Location was great for all the activities we had planned. Rooms were the perfect size for a family of four.  Would I stay there again? No, location and breakfast are not worth a $300 tow charge and rude employees.
Manager Response: Dear valued guest, Thank you for sharing your thoughts. I'm sorry you felt our front desk was rude. If you can tell us who you spoke to at the front desk, I would greatly appreciate it. We acknowledge that getting your car towed is always an inconvenience, for that reason we make sure to provide every guest with a parking permit to avoid any towing. We do have working cameras but they are not monitored 24 hours. please understand we would never intentionally have a guest vehicle towed. I am happy to hear you enjoyed the location and room. I hope you can change your mind and give us another chance to make it up to you. If there is anything we can do, please contact us at 714.841.0214.

Summary: The front desk staff couldn't have been more helpful and even though my room was right next to the parking lot and close to the main street, I slept perfectly well without much noise. Breakfast is amusingly do-it-yourself - styrofoam plates and plastic cutlery (losing points for the environmental impact), a waffle maker and some packets of Quaker oatmeal - but it's got a lot of options. Most amazingly, the WiFi never dropped once.
Manager Response: Dear valued guest, Thank you very much for taking the time to share your experience. We have noted your thoughts on our breakfast utilities and will explore our options. other than that I'm glad you had a positive experience and we hope to welcome you back soon.

Summary Heading: Nice hotel right off the I-405 in Orange County
Summary: This was a very nice hotel. The towels were large and soft (a must for a good review), the bed was comfy and the room I had also had a couch and large bathroom.  It is near many restaurants and stores, and very easy to find and is near to all.
Manager Response: Dear valued guest, We appreciate you taking the time to give us a positive feedback. We are very excited to hear you enjoyed your time with us. We hope to see you back again on your next visit to the area.

Summary: We spent a day at the beach after our exhausting 2-day Disney excursion and just needed a place for the night because we didn´t really feel like driving all the way into LA. The hotel has a solid value-for-money ratio. We felt the room was ok, nothing spectacular and the pictures suggest some rooms have already been renovated. Nevertheless: the room was clean, the beds were good for us, the bathroom in good condition and clean as well. I read the rooms were small but we were 2 adults 2 pre-teen kids and had no issue with out 2 large, 2 small pieces of luggage. Breakfast was included and hosted the usual suspects, but for us absolutely ok.seating was good and enough for all at peak times. If you prefer a more extensive choice of dishes, there is a larger mall with several
Manager Response: Dear valued guest, Thank you very much for your review. We are so happy to hear you and your family had an overall good stay at our hotel. It's nice to hear you enjoyed our room size, hotel cleanliness, and location. we look forward to having you back with us when returning to Huntington Beach.

Summary: We stayed in this hotel right after our two week trip across western USA. It was the perfect spot to relax and enjoy the ocean. Great value for money with spacious rooms. It's close to some nice restaurants and bars. Also dinsneyland is only half an hour away. Go here if you want to have some relaxation time near busy LA.
Manager Response: Dear valued guest, Thank you for taking the time to share your experience with us, we greatly appreciate it. We are very happy to hear you had a relaxing stay with. We would love to have you again on you next trip to Disneyland.

Summary: Worst service and bad bad bad people running it. Stay away double charges and complete refusal to correct the problem. Called front desk to try to resolve the problem and were hung up on 3 times.  Mike the manager completely rude and unhelpful. BAD BAD BAD PLACE AND PEOPLE
Manager Response: Dear valued guest, Thank you for sharing your thoughts. I am so sorry to hear you've had a negative experience with us. We're not perfect by all means, but we always strive to make certain our guests are taken care of. If we drop the ball somewhere, we acknowledge that and discuss appropriate steps to make things right. In this case, I'm sorry the situation was not handled. I would still love to help resolve any issue you've encountered with us. Please give me a call at 714-841-0214

Summary Heading: It's good for the price you pay
Summary: I'm used to stay in this hotel for the last 10 years, sometimes it's my only option with a good price in the area. It's a good hotel, not fancy or modern. The staff is polite, not very friendly though, but it's ok. Good internet, ok breakfast. The location is fantastic, close to the freeway and to the beach (10 min max by car). There is a target, and good restaurants and cafes just crossing the street. Safe area, safe to a lonely traveler too. Sometimes in the summer it's a little noisy, messy with too many young people around, just so you know. Some of the rooms haven't still been renewed, so they are a little outdated.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for being a frequent guest of ours! We appreciate you choosing to stay at our hotel during your visits to the area and for taking the time out of your day to share your experience with us. We acknowleged your comments about our staff. I'm sorry you left our Hotel with this impression, please accept our apologies. We look forward to welcoming you back on your next visit.

Summary: We stayed here for two nights while visiting family.  Front desk was very professional and helpful.  Room  was nice size with a comfortable couch,  very comfortable bed, nice bathrooms and shower, very clean. Breakfast was great, with a lot of items to choose from!
Manager Response: Dear valued guest, Thank you so much for your nice words. We love when guests have a great time staying with us. We look forward to seeing you on your next visit.

Summary: We booked this hotel/motel online after reading mostly good reviews. Clean, spacious rooms, bathrooms. A little noisy late at night as there is a jack in the box next door and our room was 3rd floor facing the south. Probably quieter on the other side. Free hot breakfast every morning, not just continental. Eggs, bacon, waffles the works. Great location for beaches, Disneyland, Knott's Berry Farm. Great place if your on a budget. Only problem we had was our room keys had to be re-keyed the second day for some reason.
Manager Response: Dear valued guest, Thank you for taking the time to give us your feedback. I'm sorry for having to trouble you with getting your room keys re-keyed on your second night. We will work hard to avoid that issue from recurring. As for the noise, we will be happy to assign you to a room on the opposite side upon request. I am glad the rest of you stay was pleasant and we look forward to having you again soon.

Summary: If I could give a zero I would. Unfortunately not an option. The shower faucet literally broke off during my Mom's shower on day 2 of a 3 night stay. went to switch rooms thinking they would accommodate us appropriately and instead the manager turned it into a nightmare experience. He blamed us/asked us why we didn't tell him it was broken sooner in our stay (she told him 5 minutes after it happened, her hair was still soaking wet) than proceeded to be condescending and rude. The rooms aren't even worth what you are paying for.. At all. We only stayed there because we had to book a last minute trip to see my sick grandpa. He even had the nerve to step up to me and continue to argue in which I told him to get away from me multiple times. He didn't so I than swore "get the f*^%
Manager Response: Dear valued guest, Thank you for sharing your thoughts. I am so sorry to hear you've had a negative experience with us. We're not perfect by all means, but we always strive to make sure our guests are taken care of. I'm sorry the situation was not handled properly, we are extremely sorry about that. We look forward to another opportunity to host you at our property, and once again, thank you for your comments! We hope your next visit will be more pleasant.  Thank you, Comfort Suits Huntington Beach   (714) 841-1812

Summary: Stayed here with wife and our two large teenagers and plenty of room for us all even with a pull down bed. Room facilities very good and main king bed super comfortable. Large bathroom with good facilities.   Breakfast was included with our room. This was amazing. The staff took great pride in producing different food each day and kept filling things up.   Couldn't really complain. Great location for short drive to beach. Vons and Starbucks just across the road.  In n out Burger just a short drive away so all good. Try Korean BBQ for lunch too.   Staff in hotel very helpful especially Ray who helped us get my son's watch, we left in mistake, home safely.
Manager Response: Dear valued guest, Thank you so much for your positive comments. It's a pleasure to hear you've had an overall enjoyable stay with us. Happy to hear that Ray was able to help you find your son's watch. We look forward to seeing you on your next visit.

Summary: Terrible staff and manager.  Said they had 2 queen beds and upon check-in we were given a king and a pull out sofa.  Requested a different room with 2 queens and none were available.  Immediately checked out and the manager refuses to reimburse us having never even set foot in the room.   He said he is standing by his staff.  Mike is the manager and along with his staff, don't deserve your stay!
Manager Response: Dear valued guest, Thank you for taking the time to share your thoughts with us. I'm sorry you've had a negative experience at our hotel. We do have a 24 hour cancelation policy at our hotel that we must follow. Allow us to make it up to you on your next stay with us. We will do our best to accommodate you with a room of you choosing. If there is anything we can do, please give us a call at 714-841-0214.

Summary: I checked into Comfort inn suites on 3 July 2016 and checked out on 5 July 2016. The agreed upon rate for those two nights was $509.19 however, I was charged a total of $773.86. On the night of the 3rd I was told by the staff that I could not listen to music in the balcony since it would inconvenience guests in the adjacent rooms. The staff was very unprofessional in doing so but I did as they requested and went inside. The manager, Mike, then called my room and threatened to evict me and charge the other rooms to my account. There were no warnings and the manager behaved very unprofessionally as well. Even though I did as he requested he then sent the maintenance person to my room to “check something out”. After talking to that individual he informed me that he did not know why
Manager Response: Dear valued guest, Thank you for sharing your thoughts with us. Sorry you feel that way. We made many attempts to talk to you about the loud noise in the room; unfortunately you refused to cooperate with us. After 4 warnings from the front desk there was still loud music coming from your room. As a result of the loud music coming from your room, the guest staying in the room adjacent to yours requested a full refund and checked out of our hotel. We have zero tolerance for loud music and parties in the room. If you have any questions or concerns please contact us at 714-841-0214.

Summary Heading: Room was better than expected, service not so much
Summary: The room was actually better than I expected.  King bed with attached living area (small half wall divider between).  Comfortable bed, good couch.  Clean.  The reception I received on arrival, however, was not as good.  When we arrived, we had just flown in across country and driven several hours.  When we were greeted, we were told that we had to produce the credit card that paid for the reservation.  My husband had been driving and pulled out his wallet and presented the card.  The receptionist announced that she had to have my card (same number) as I had made the reservation.  My carry-on was buried in the back of the SUV behind all of our luggage.  I explained that my husband's card was the same card number, same last name, same address.  But she would not give us the keys
Manager Response: Dear valued guest, Thank you for taking the time to share your experience. I am sorry to hear you had a substandard check-in process. We have certain hotel polices that we must follow. I have noted your thoughts on making sure all website are more clear. Other than that I'm glad you've had a comfortable stay with us. Hope you choose to stay at our hotel again when back in Huntington Beach.

Summary: Wonderful stay at this property. It was clean and comfortable. Breakfast was decent and we felt safe. It is located right off the freeway and across the street was a huge mall worth restaurants, shopping, and entertainment. I would recommend to friends and family.
Manager Response: Dear valued guest, Appreciate you taking the time to post your thoughts on your stay with us! We're so happy to hear that you had a great time and plan to recommend us to others. Thank you for that! Looking forward to seeing you back with us again soon.

Summary Heading: Tight four for a week stay stupid travel agent
Summary: The room we had was a Joke  one king and a sofa for four adults the accessible bathroom had more room than the room itself   we ended up with 15 cakes of soap and 30 bottle of shampoo and conditioner we don't like the hotel toiletries  but the house keeping kept leaving it Location  not even near the beach must have a car if you stay here. The breakfast was included but everything you choose to eat is off plastic plates cups  knives and fork such a waste on the planet.:(
Manager Response: Dear valued guest, Thank you for taking the time to share your thoughts with us. We truly apologize for not living up to your expectation. I am happy to share with you that we do offer family rooms that come with two queen beds in separate room and one sofa bed. We have noted your thoughts about using plastic utilities and will consider switching to something more eco friendly. Thank you again for sharing with us and we hope you would considering giving us a chance to make it up to you on your next stay. If there is anything we can do, please contact us at 714-841-1812

Summary Heading: Comfort Suites, Huntington Beach. C. A.
Summary: This is a great place to stay for a couple of days in Huntington Beach, Orange County. The rooms are spacious and the facilities are excellent. There is adequate parking and this hotel is in a good location within easy reach of the beach and other attractions of the area. The price is reasonable.
Manager Response: Dear valued guest, Appreciate you taking the time to post your thoughts on your stay with us! We're so happy to hear that you had a great time. Looking forward to seeing you back with us again soon.

Summary: I was in town for work and booked this location based on reviews.  I am not normally a Choice Hotel fan but thought I would give it a try.  I was surprised to see it is an exterior  corridor location.  The room décor and cleanliness was very good.  While I was there the maintenance person was giving a fresh coat of paint to guest room doors.  The breakfast was ok but the dining area is way to small.  Customer service is not very high but everyone is nice and polite.  I did have issues with the internet but they had recently changed providers and followed up multiple times while the issue was being fixed.  If in the area I would stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear valued guest, Thank you for taking the time to write us a positive review. We have noted your thoughts on the breakfast area and will do our best to try to provide more space. I am happy to let you know our Wi-Fi is now working great, we have not received any complaints. other than that, I'm glad to hear you had an overall enjoyable stay with us. our team looks forward to welcoming you back to our hotel.

Summary: We stayed here as the first stop of our touring holiday around Southern California for 2 nights as a family of 4. The hotel was easy to find, conveniently located for Huntington Beach (straight drive down Beach Blvd) and lots of eating out venues within walking distance. Either directly across the road or turn left and there are plenty of great options at Bella Terra, approx 10 min walk away.  Hotel was perfectly adequate with 1 large King size bed and a double sofa bed. Decent size bathroom with hairdryer. Great TV with plenty of channels, coffee maker etc. Plenty of FREE parking and a small swimming pool.  We had 2 good nights sleep in a quiet room. The only downside was the resident above us seemed to never ever sleep and as they walked around the floorboards squeaked! The
Manager Response: Dear valued guest, Thank you for taking the time to write us a positive review, we greatly appreciate it. I am happy our hotels location and amenities was at convenience to you and we look forward to seeing you on your future stay with us.

Summary: Comfort Suites Huntington Beach is located just off the 405, close to shopping and ample family restaurants.  It is however, about a 15 minute drive to the beach.  My room was a good size, clean and comfortable. The free wi-fi in the room was fast and reliable.   Breakfast was provided and proved to be popular as the dining area was always busy when I went. I would recommend this hotel to anyone looking for a hotel in Huntington Beach.
Manager Response: Dear valued guest,  Thank you for your kind words. I am happy you've had a comfortable stay with us and hope your next visit is just around the corner!

Summary: DO NOT STAY IN THIS PROPERTY. I made a mistake in booking my reservation and the management were very unhelpful and self centered. NO WAY TO RUN A BUSINESS!!!!! I will tell everyone i know to avoid this property.
Manager Response: Dear valued guest,  Thank you for sharing your thoughts. We are very sorry you feel this way.  If you have a moment to provide any insight on the issue you faced while making your booking, it will assist us in making sure this does not happen again. We'd like to make certain future guests, as well as yourself, have an easier time booking with us. I would love to hear from you at 714-841-0214.

Summary: Booking got cancelled due to staff miscommunication with booking agency, they wouldn't refund so we could stay somewhere else so had to change days. Tried to check in early but due to long weekend wasn't possible, that is understandable, asked to have a room near friends held for us but when we came back all rooms on top floor were taken and no notes were in the system asking to reserve a room for us. Near road and was very noisy.  Breakfast was average at best and you had better be quick or it was gone.   Took almost a week to receive our held money back as our bank was waiting for vendor to confirm amount, only called bank as the staff person at the hotel I spoke to told me "we don't control the banks!" Still waiting for the manager to call me back to follow up on deposit
Manager Response: Dear valued guest, Thank you for taking the time to post feedback on your experience with us. We're sorry to hear that your interaction wasn't up to the standard that is expected of us. First, I would like to deeply apologize for any miscommunication that occurred during your stay. In regard to your deposit, we immediately release back to your bank upon checkout. It is then depending on your bank how fast they process it back to you. Sorry for your room being noisy, we do have rooms that are further from traffic that would be much quitter. Lastly, I apologize for not getting back to you sooner.We certainly don't want to lose your business and would appreciate you giving us a second chance to make it up to you. If there is anything we can do please contact us at 714-841-0214.

Summary: We just spent the night here and it was great. Nice comfortable rooms. Nice staff. Helping with anything you need .  Good breakfast too for being complimentary. Not just cereal and oatmeal. Biscuits and gravy ! Juices . Coffee.
Manager Response: Dear valued guest, We truly thank you for your positive review. We are very happy to hear you've enjoyed our hotel and complimentary breakfast. We look forward to having you again.

Summary Heading: Not closer enough to the beach
Summary: Clean room we had a acessable room on the ground floor it was a tight with the four of us but we coped with it for our stay. The room lacked sunshine  and was quite noisey with traffic lights just nearby. What really BUG me in these chain hotels is the breakfast provide  you are expected eat off is bloody plastic ,forks, knives, cups ,bowls .for ,plates for God sake don't you care about the planet .what wrong with ceramic crockery and metal cutlery .much cheaper and better for our world. staff where friendly and plenty of takeaway food places nearby .
Manager Response: Dear valued guest, thank you for taking the time to share your experience with us. I am pleased to announce we have a family room available at this hotel that can accommodate up to 6 guest with plenty of space. Thank you for the advise on breakfast utilities, we are happy to consider more eco friendly utilities. Please give us a call if there is anything we can help you with and we look forward to your next stay with us.

Summary: Check-in was easy.  Room was on 2nd level but was easy to get to via stairwell or elevator.  Room was very clean.  Only problem was the heater/ac.  It was cool during our stay and the heater worked, but the the fan was operated manually, low, med or high.  The blower ran continuously until you shut it off.  So, the room would get warm, shut off; the room would cool down, turn on.  This would get a bit tiresome after awhile, but since we did not spend a lot of time in the room, it was doable.  Breakfast was included, which was adequate.  Shopping center across the street had plenty of places to eat.
Manager Response: Dear valued guest, Thank you for taking the time to share with us your experience. We have noted your thoughts about the air conditioning and will pleased to provide you a room with better air conditioning on your next stay with us. Other than that I'm glad you've enjoyed are convenient location and other amenities. We look forward to seeing you on your next visit.

Summary: For the value, this property really shines. The rooms, though not large (King Bed with sofa sleeper), are extremely clean and well appointed. I believe they just renovated some of the rooms and it was obvious mine was. The complimentary breakfast was more than adequate and the front desk personnel very friendly. I requested a top floor room and was very happy with Room #328 (this room sits a bit back from the busy Beach Boulevard/39). The location couldn't be better with easy access to 405 and not far from the Beach. There are many restaurant options nearby like B.J.'s, Cheesecake Factory, Buca di Beppo, and many other local choices in the nearby Bella Terra complex. An excellent property all around!
Manager Response: Dear valued guest, Thank you for sharing your experience with us. I am glad we exceeded your expectation. We take pride in making sure all our guest leave our hotel happy. We look forward to having you at our hotel again.

Summary: Fair hotel...nice and clean room...breakfast barely adequate for the 98 $ i paid for the stay. Heater and ac very noisy. The suprise came when asked to stay one more night...price increased to 109$ without any reason. It was a monday..so no week end in sight. Very poor behaviour by the staff
Manager Response: Dear valued guest,  Thank you for sharing your thoughts. We serve complementary hot breakfast that provide our guest with plenty of options to chose from. If you can give us a suggested of what you would like us to add, we will be happy to consider it. As for the price, it is continually changes, as for most hotels. We always try to gear ourselves to guests with varying travel budgets. If there is anything we can do, please contact us at 714-841-0214.

Summary Heading: Poor to Average but Meets Basic Needs
Summary: I stayed here one night while on a road trip throughout California. I wanted to stay here because I had reservations at a great foot massage place located in Westminister, nearby. My stay was 12/16/15. We were given a room on the second floor, but arrived to find a maintenance man doing repairs and repainting trim. They staff quickly moved us to a different room. This is a two star hotel offering only basic services. The photos from others accurately depict what you are getting. Everything was fine. It was quiet and the TV worked well. We had good Wifi.  Breakfast in the morning was YUCK. We passed and took some fruit with us on the road.  Total cost with tax for one night: $111.85
